TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract sealed beforefieldinit ClaimTypes extends System.Object
public ref class ClaimTypes abstract sealed

Docs.summary: Represents the pre-defined types of claims that an entity can claim. This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format:
## Remarks Use the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Claims.ClaimTypes> class to search for a particular type of claim in a <xref:System.IdentityModel.Claims.ClaimSet> or to create a claim. To search for a particular type of claim in a <xref:System.IdentityModel.Claims.ClaimSet>, use the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Claims.ClaimSet.FindClaims%28System.String%2CSystem.String%29> method and use the properties of this class to specify the claim type for the `claimType` parameter. When the constructor for the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Claims.Claim> class is used to create a new claim, use the properties of the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Claims.ClaimTypes> class to specify the `claimType` parameter. For many of the claim types, the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Claims.Claim> class has static properties that return a claim of a specific type. For instance, the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Claims.Claim.CreateHashClaim%28System.Byte%5B%5D%29> method returns a claim using the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Claims.ClaimTypes.Hash%2A> claim type.
## Examples [!code-csharp[c_ClaimTypes#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/c_claimtypes/cs/service.cs#1)] [!code-vb[c_ClaimTypes#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CFX/c_claimtypes/vb/service.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly Property Anonymous As String
public: static property System::String ^ Anonymous { System::String ^ get(); };

Docs.summary: Gets the URI for a claim that specifies the anonymous user.
Docs.value: The URI for a claim that specifies the anonymous user.

remarks.format:
## Remarks
The string returned by this property is `http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/ws/2005/05/identity/claims/anonymous`.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly Property Authentication As String
public: static property System::String ^ Authentication { System::String ^ get(); };

Docs.summary: Gets the URI for a claim that specifies details about whether an identity is authenticated.
Docs.value: The URI for a claim that specifies details about whether an identity is authenticated.

remarks.format: ## Remarks The string returned by this property is `http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/ws/2005/05/identity/claims/authentication`.

public: static property System::String ^ AuthorizationDecision { System::String ^ get(); };

Docs.value: The URI for a claim that specifies an authorization decision on an entity.

remarks.format: ## Remarks The string returned by this property is `http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/ws/2005/05/identity/claims/authorizationdecision`.

remarks.format: ## Remarks The string returned by this property is `http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/ws/2005/05/identity/claims/country`.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly Property DenyOnlySid As String
public: static property System::String ^ DenyOnlySid { System::String ^ get(); };

Docs.summary: Gets the URI for a claim that specifies a deny-only security identifier (SID) for an entity.
Docs.value: The URI for a claim that specifies a deny-only SID for an entity.

remarks.format:
## Remarks A deny-only SID denies the specified entity to a securable object.
The string returned by this property is `http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/ws/2005/05/identity/claims/denyonlysid`.

remarks.format: ## Remarks The string returned by this property is `http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/ws/2005/05/identity/claims/dns`.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly Property System As String
public: static property System::String ^ System { System::String ^ get(); };

Docs.summary: Gets the URI for a claim that identifies the system entity.
Docs.value: The URI for a claim that identifies the system entity.

remarks.format:
## Remarks The <xref:System.IdentityModel.Claims.ClaimTypes.System%2A> is typically used to identify the issuer of a claim when the issuer is the current application.
The string returned by this property is `http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/ws/2005/05/identity/claims/system`.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly Property Thumbprint As String
public: static property System::String ^ Thumbprint { System::String ^ get(); };

Docs.summary: Gets the URI for a claim that specifies a thumbprint.
Docs.value: The URI for a claim that specifies a thumbprint.

remarks.format:
## Remarks A thumbprint is a globally unique SHA-1 hash of an X.509 certificate.
The string returned by this property is `http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/ws/2005/05/identity/claims/thumbprint`.

Docs.value: The URI for a claim that specifies UPN.

remarks.format:
## Remarks The string returned by this property is `http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/ws/2005/05/identity/claims/upn`.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly Property X500DistinguishedName As String
public: static property System::String ^ X500DistinguishedName { System::String ^ get(); };

Docs.summary: Gets the string that contains the URI for a distinguished name claim of an X.509 certificate.
Docs.value: The URI for a distinguished name claim of an X.509 certificate.

remarks.format: ## Remarks The X.500 standard defines the methodology for defining distinguished names that is used by X.509 certificates.
